fullplot: Surya (Mahesh Babu) comes to Mumbai with a sole aim to become "Bhai" for the city. He starts his mission by recruiting rowdies for monthly salaries. He eyes Mumbai Police Commissioner's daughter Chitra (Kajal) and loves her. How did he become Bhai and turn out to a big Businessman, forms rest of the story
plot: An extremely intelligent and ambitious youngster "Surya" arrives in Mumbai to become a mafia don.
title: Business Man
